Package it.danja.newsmonitor.interpreters

Class SoupParser

java.lang.Object
it.danja.newsmonitor.interpreters.FeedParserBase
it.danja.newsmonitor.interpreters.SoupParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeedParser
public class SoupParser extends FeedParserBase
Basic tag soup/ill-formed XML/XHTML parser FIXME produces SAX2 callbacks mostly namespace-aware ported from https://web.archive.org/web/20050210065742/http://dannyayers.com/archives /2004/07/11/tag-soup-play-code/ fills in missing end tags and is pretty forgiving of other errors. It’s namespace-aware up to a point, if there are nested changes to the default namespace it’ll get confused.
